name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Mature, Level-Headed, and Dependable Secretary Maid GP-02
description: "Secretary Maid" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP02." 1. Marriage system 2. Private maid mode 3. Empire life mode

name: Follow Dream
description: It is an innovative elimination game that combines classic block gameplay with modern color art.

name: Mystery Escape
description: Dive into an adventure, alone, with your friends or play with random people. Solve various puzzles and overcome all the traps. There are currently 5 different rooms in which you can prove yourself. More and more rooms will be added in permanent updates. I hope to see you on the other side.

name: Let's Go Home!
description: “Let's Go Home!” is a fun and challenging game where you play as the main character who has forgotten the way home.

name: Cashier Sim
description: Do you want to start making your first money and no one accepts you without experience?

name: Blood On The Dusty Trail
description: In this thrilling audio book, we follow the story of Caleb, a young outlaw who finds himself on the run after a robbery. As he navigates the dangers of the Wild West, his gang of outlaws plan their get away.

name: Cubic Enigma
description: Immerse yourself in the fascinating ancient world of cube puzzles, where each step reveals a new mystery. You will explore different zones, each filled with unique puzzles that require the use of cubes to solve them.

name: Absolute Fear: Aooni
description:
20 years after the birth of the legendary horror game "AOONI"...
A completely new first-person, 3D horror stealth action "Absolute Fear -AOONI-" is now available!

name: Front Edge
description: Front Edge is a real-time strategy game set in a modern warfare setting.

name: Purpose Calling
description: Saving people, solving puzzles, and repairing what’s broken. Designed for young heroes aged 7-9, Purpose Calling invites players to step into the shoes of a hero who's power suit allow them to be a detective, EMT, firefighter, and construction worker to make a difference, one adventure at a time!

name: Ivorfall
description: Ivorfall City is in danger and only you have what it takes to save it! Ivorfall is a Steampunk, roguelike, twin-stick shooter where you take up the mantle of Detective Flintlock who must face off against hordes of enemies in destructible environments.

name: Rogue Girl
description: Rogue Girl is a roguelike game that will immerse you in an exciting adventure, where you will play as a beautiful devil girl called upon to fight an army of sinister zombies. Your path of progress depends on your decisions. Various types of enemies, random rooms, and skills.

name: Icarus: Creature Comforts Pack
description: This pack unlocks 20 new Husbandry items to craft, including luxury water troughs, covered food troughs, craftable saddles, and more

name: Bombox
description: Bombox is a fast-paced casual game. Players must find and defuse the correct bomb wires before the countdown on the bomb box ends.

name: A Living Room
description: You are a man in a room. Something feels off. Or maybe it's on. A short existential comedy point-and-click non-adventure about the limitations and imitations of human existence – or, really, whatever you want it to be about.

name: Shadow Brawl
description: Shadow Brawl goes through the story of you as a character who got pulled into another dimension by a powerful crystal the first thing you see in this strange land is a talking pancake! who tells you that a group of evil robots are the ones responsible and your mission is to retrieve the crystal.

name: Princess x Audience
description: Sin descripción

name: Band of Brigands
description: Band of Brigands is an exhilarating dungeon crawler where players vie for riches in treacherous depths. Outsmart lurking monsters and rival brigands alike. Snatch valuable loot and escape before your teammates do. In this world, trust is transient, and alliances shift like shadows.

name: Soulbind: Prologue
description: Soulbind: Prologue is an action platformer in the Roguelike genre. The hero is a common skeleton and an outsider. But there is one special feature - you can replace your body parts with parts of your opponents' bodies. Learn the backstory and start your journey in the world of Allaar.

name: Teared
description: Embark on a thrilling 3D arcade action-platformer adventure in Teared. Travel through 9 challenging levels filled with epic bosses and a variety of deadly creatures. Are you ready for this epic journey?

name: Dash & Roll
description: Dash & Roll - Magic in Motion. Jump, dash, dodge, and discover the secret behind this magical marvelous marble adventure!

name: Fallen's Challenge
description: Experience a Sokoban game like no other! Unique combat, gameplay, puzzles, music, pixel-art, and cutscenes. With the powers of the gems, go on a journey to discover ascension!

name: Joy Land
description: Lewis, an intelligent detective, finds himself on a mission to uncover the truth behind the many disappearances including his sister's. With the help of Joy, Lewis is going to explore what lies behind these walls. only to realize that there's much more to discover than he initially thought.

name: Arcade Paradise VR
description: Transform the King Wash, a decrepit family-owned laundromat, into a booming arcade business. Get hands on managing the fully gamified day-to-day tasks, from manually picking up gum, doing the laundry, and scrubbing a toilet perfectly clean - to throwing out the trash in a basketball style mini game. Then, take your hard-earned money from completing these tasks to unlock your real objective… buying more arcade units!

name: Aliya
description: You accidentally connect with a girl in space who is in distress 1000 years later... How will you solve the crisis and discover the truth?

name: Standalone: Synergy
description: Standalone: Synergy, the ultimate CCG deck builder with rogue-lite elements. Immerse yourself in an epic campaign, with a gripping voice-over narrative, embark on thrilling adventures in procedural dungeons, unleash your strategic prowess in intense player versus player combat within the Arena!

name: Bride into the Cave
description: Myth lingers in a tranquil and remote ancient town in China. In one telling, once a beautiful maiden is chosen by the cave deity, her soul disappears from the mortal realm. A minority girl called Miao Fei embarks on her journey to uncover the truth behind the legend, and rescue herself, perhap.

name: Bootleg Steamer
description: Bootleg Steamer is a top down tactical trading game. Using a ship to smuggle alcohol, earn steep profits while evading authorities. Invest earnings to hire more crew and purchase upgrades. Create criminal contacts to improve your operation with the goal of accruing a massive fortune.

name: Dice Assassin
description: Dice Assassin is a challenging game where you defeat enemies on the board according to the dice numbers. Choose attacks using cards, position yourself strategically to overcome enemies on the board, and devise tactics using action cards.

name: The Last Game
description: Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

name: SaGa: Emerald Beyond
description:
The latest standalone entry in the SaGa franchise arrives in 2024, bringing together the very best elements of the beloved series to offer each player their own unique gameplay experience.

Make use of Glimmers and United Attacks in battle; meet a diverse cast of races including monsters, mechs and vampires; and experience your very own story, created through your choices and actions.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit I

name: Whisker Waters
description:
Whisker Waters is the ultimate RPG adventure that blends light fantasy and the art of fishing into a mesmerizing world. As a player, you'll create and play as your very own Cat character and embark on a whimsical fishing journey like never before.

Unlike any other game, Whisker Waters makes fishing the star of the show! Use cool fishing tools to explore and catch all kinds of unique fish. Each fish has its own tricks, making it exciting and rewarding!

name: What Have You Done, Father?
description: An atrocious scandal threatens the Catholic Church when the lifeless body of a woman is discovered in the rectory of a young priest.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Sweep the Board!
description: Embark on an adventure through iconic settings from the anime Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba in this action-packed board game. Compete with friends as you brave the elements on your quest to become the strongest demon slayer!

name: Automate Defend Repeat
description: Automate, Defend, Repeat: a cosmic game of factory management and tower defense strategy. Build a planet-dominating factory, defend it from disgruntled elementals, and upgrade until the locals hand over the keys to their world. Once you've claimed one planet, launch off to colonize the next!

name: Pine Harbor
description: Pine Harbor was a small fishing town on the shores of the North Atlantic Ocean, surrounded by cliffs and dense pine forests, shrouded in thick fog. But everything changed as a result of a technological disaster. Explore the town, help its residents, and delve into the depths of the dark forests.

name: Contractors Showdown
description: Contractors Showdown delivers adrenaline-fueled VR combat with two distinct modes: fast-paced Battle Royale and the immersive, tactical Exfil Zone. Customize your loadout, complete missions, and fight to survive in dynamic, high-stakes battles. Gear up, squad up, and dominate the VR battlefield!

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - The Book of Hungry Names
description: Save the living earth with Rage and spirit! Awaken ancient mysteries, rebuild your fallen pack, and unleash your fearsome might to heal a shattered land. A text-based interactive novel set in the World of Darkness.

name: Rustil: Eternal Labyrinth Castle
description: In a randomly changing labyrinth castle, Rustil aims for the top floor. An exhilarating roguelike action game in which players aim to reach the top floor while efficiently strengthening the main character by acquiring abilities from the souls of heroes.

name: Megaton Musashi W: Wired
description:
Megaton Musashi W: Wired is set on Earth in the year 2118. The main characters pilot giant machines called “Musashi” to combat the Draktor, invaders from outer space that destroyed the planet in a matter of days.

This is the global version of Megaton Musashi X (Cross) with additional content.

name: SmileXCorp 3
description: After helping the Resistance, and infiltrating the train bound for the corporation, you must take control of the situation and fight the enemy from within. Enter the Smiling-X horror game and help the Resistance defeat the evil corporation that is trying to manipulate

name: Infected: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Story
description: The world awakened in hysteria - a severe infection has spread, zombifying people. Panic is everywhere and all you have to do - is to survive and find people who survived too. You have to fight your way through crowds of zombies and find the refugees who managed to escape.

name: Oriental Valley
description: Oriental Valley is a simulation game, with modern new rural construction and Chinese characteristics.You coincidentally come to a modern village, build a modern new home, experience modern rural life, understand modern agriculture, meet friends, and live a happy life.

name: MapleStory Worlds
description: MapleStory Worlds is the next generation "Content Creation & Play Platform" where anyone can build and enjoy content. MapleStory Worlds welcomes you with an array of diverse Worlds, from content uniquely designed by myself to original series created by other MapleStory World Developers! With a roster of easy-peasy creation-paced avatars, communicating with your friends will double your experience in MapleStory Worlds!

name: Nordic Ashes: Survivors of Ragnarok
description:
Norse themed Roguelike enemy hell, where you’ll have to survive hordes of creatures that come your way. Unlock new weapons and abilities as you battle. Upgrade your character's stats with Constellation Ability Trees and slay your enemies before they surround you, or it may be too late…

Fight all sorts of beasts, from basic creatures to Elite monsters and Epic bosses with their own AI. Don’t be fooled, even minions can be pretty dangerous!

Unlock new weapons and abilities as you battle. Upgrade your characters’ stats with Constellation Ability Trees and slay your enemies before they surround you, or it may be too late…

After Ragnarok, Yggdrasil, the World Tree, lost almost all of its energy to sustain the Nine Realms. Only a few heroes survived the End of the World. In this Technical Demo you’ll play as Axeldör, a Norse berserker, Thyra a fierce hunter, and Hafgrim, a master of the elements. Wield a legendary sword, or maybe conjure ancient fire to slay all the enemies that have reached your realm to conquer its remains.

Design different builds and make each run different by using the Constellation Ability Trees to upgrade your damage, area, cooldown and many more stats during each run.

name: Virtua Unlimited Project
description: Virtua Unlimited Project is a 2D pixel-art style ACT game featuring VTuber characters. With classical platformer gameplay, challenging combat, and retro game feelings, VUP presents you a surreal, virtual world in which you will play as Aizawa Kana to venture and seek the truth beneath.

name: Story of Eve 2
description: Guide Eve through a succubus training program in the newest "Story of Eve". Experience a new story with improved mechanics and even more outrageous training scenes and outfits!

name: Another Crab's Treasure
description: Another Crab’s Treasure is a soulslike adventure set in a crumbling underwater world plagued by a mysterious curse. As Kril the hermit crab, you’ll need to wear the trash around you as shells to withstand attacks from enemies many times your size. Embark on an epic treasure hunt to buy back your repossessed shell, and discover the dark secrets behind the polluted ocean.

name: CTcity
description: Reality ruins, tiles of CT city block his heart. Imagination flies, plants in the mind become his star. Boy wonders, the road is nowhere to go. Journey begins, the key is just himself. Welcome to CT city!

name: Agent Simulation
description: If you are a sharpshooter, you would be a great fit for us. Within a short period of time, select 3 options from the list and deal with your enemies. Do not forget that the ability of using time efficiently and aiming your targets are crucial. Complete each mission and earn an agent certification.

name: Diluvian Winds
description: Diluvian Winds is a management game set in a small hamlet at the foot of a lighthouse. Welcome weary travelers and help each other to try and survive the unpredictable weather. Grow your hamlet on land, under the sea or among the clouds.

name: Forewarned
description: FOREWARNED is a 1-4 player co-op survival horror. Gear up and delve deep into ancient Egyptian ruins with your team of fellow archaeologists. Collect treasure, recover relics, discover lore, and survive the evil that lurks within.

name: S.O.L: Search of Light
description: Search Of Light is a steampunk/dark fantasy setting adventure and the combination of village management and tower defense mechanics that we define as adventure management.

name: Minicology
description: You have crash-landed into a mini-verse of tiny planets. Welcome to Minicology! Embark on an interstellar survival sandbox journey. Use your crafting, combat, and automation skills to survive the many challenges this mini-verse throws at you.

description: Sin descripción

description: Bundle released exclusively on Steam.

description: Bundle released exclusively on Steam.

name: Ooga Booga: Troubles in Time
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure in "Ooga Booga: Troubles in Time"! Choose your character and travel through different universes to defeat the forces of evil, the enemy is waiting to beat you up! Try the best controls for platform games. Jump over obstacles to pass the level. Fight against a multitude of enemies in different scenarios. Escape from the rolling stone down the hill. Ride the pig and dodge the thugs. Talk to the characters to defeat the final boss. BEWARE, the enemy wants to trick you, don't fall into his traps. Prove that you are the chosen one!

name: Escape the Glitch 2: Backrooms
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure deep within the eerie Backrooms in our latest game. Your task remains the same: find five elusive bottles hidden throughout the maze-like corridors while dodging the relentless pursuit of the glitcher.

name: Lords of the Fallen: Master of Fate Update
description:
VERSION 1.5 - 'Master of Fate': This update represents the culmination of 30+ post-launch updates resulting in significantly improved performance, stability & optimization, alongside rigorous difficulty balancing, and also includes our 'Advanced Game Modifier System', allowing ALL players to fully customize and adjust difficulty of future play-throughs.

The Master of Fate Update concludes now concludes the Free Content Roadmap for Lords of the Fallen, adding the following content and quality-of-life enhancements, vastly improving the experience for all players:

- Significant performance, optimization and stability improvements
- Rigorous difficulty balancing including mob density reduction & nerfed ranged attacks
- Split PvP and PvE game balancing
- Online multiplayer enhancements for improved matchmaking and connection stability
- New questlines including Season of the Bleak, Trial of the Three Spirits, and Way of the Bucket
- New armor and weapon sets
- Additional secret boss weapon abilities
- Improved boss encounters with additional movesets & new AI
- 12 new spells including the arena-devastating Immolation
- New grievous strikes: each weapon family now features two unique finishers: one for single-handed wielding and another for two-handed wielding
- 3 new projectiles: Blood Vomit, Explosive Mines, and Frost Worms.
- QOL updates including: inventory expansion, appearance reset, storage functionality & gamepad rebinding

name: Kenas-unarpe
description: A puzzle adventure inspired by the legend of the Kenas-unarpe from Ainu folklore.

name: Puss in Boots: Purrfect Adventures
description:
Embark on a feline-fueled journey in "Puss in Boots: Purrfect Adventures"! This thrilling 2D platformer game invites players into a whimsical world where our daring hero, Puss in Boots, sets out on a daring quest to save the day.

As Puss in Boots, players must traverse through enchanting landscapes, leaping across platforms and collecting coins to unlock a treasure trove of upgrades. Gather enough coins to customize your adventure with powerful bullets and fortify your health, arming yourself for the challenges ahead.

name: Musa
description: Fight numerous monsters in exciting battles and obtain them all. Defeat all monsters and obtain all artifacts.

name: Assault Suit Leynos 2: Saturn Tribute
description: Modify your robot and head to the battlefield!

name: Solium Infernum: Belphegor, Paragon of Impiety
description: Take the Infernal Throne as Belphegor, the Paragon of Impiety, a diabolical inventor whose contraptions are designed to serve one wicked purpose; to corrupt, weaken, and enslave!

name: Megaton Musashi W: Wired - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Casual Jigsaw: Vampires
description: Enjoy our new jigsaw puzzle with Hentai Casual Jigsaw - Vampires! With a lot of gorgeous illustrations of beautiful vampires and with an open gallery for you to relax and enjoy!

name: Culling of Normality
description: "A very short psychological horror Visual novel. My first ever game made for a gamejam."

name: Escape The Evil
description: You're trapped in a dark manor with a killer psychopath. You must escape by solving clues, unlocking doors and completing puzzles. You only have 5 lives!

name: Cyborg Lumberjack
description: Plunge into an exciting adventure with the new game ! .Game genre Action. Every decision matters - your choices affect the course of the game and its outcome. Can you protect the carriage and its cargo from the dangers of the forest, or will you let it perish?

name: Factory Company
description: Factory Company is a simulation game challenging players to navigate market trends, finance, and tech innovation to build a leading factory. It combines strategy and creativity to overcome market dynamics and unpredictable events.

name: Always Forward
description: A very short tap-and-jump game.

name: The Last Spell: Dwarves of Runenberg
description: Protect the haven of Runenberg, lead Dwarves with unique abilities into battle and discover new exclusive Perks, weapons and items in the first DLC of the acclaimed tactical rogue-lite. Dive once more into the chaos of The Last Spell to unleash your unique new weaponry upon the Hordes of Evil.

name: Genshin Impact: Two Worlds Aflame, the Crimson Night Fades
description:
Version 4.6 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Arlecchino
• New story quests for Arlecchino and Cyno
• New areas: Sea of Bygone Eras and Nostoi Region
• New quality of life features
• New main event: Iridescent Arataki Rockin' For Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness
• …and more!

name: Bosstack
description: A turn-based command battle game where you choose skills and jobs to fight against bosses in sequence.

name: Hentai Elf
description: Hentai Elf is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Project: Debug
description: In a city devastated by catastrophe, you're the lone survivor among nightmarish swarms of insects. Armed with bravery, cunning, and diverse weapons, navigate ruins of a once-vibrant metropolis, battling relentless waves of monstrous bugs. Survive, reclaim, conquer the infestation.

name: Ball Blitz!
description: Ball Blitz! is an engaging puzzle game where players combine sports balls to create bigger versions and earn points. With a mix of strategy and quick thinking, your goal is to achieve the highest score possible. The bigger the combination, the more points you score!

name: Raey
description: Embark on the journey and watch Raey's eventful life unfold before your eyes. From the cradle to the grave - Raey will take the player through a roller coaster of emotions as he endures everything that is thrown at him.

name: The Beast in the Shadows
description: Experience the heart-pounding suspense of a modern-day werewolf horror story as you step into the shoes of Cassie, a brave woman determined to put an end to a terrifying curse plaguing her small town.

name: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle
description: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle game to keep you happy.

name: April 24th
description: The main character is an experienced journalist who always strives to uncover the truth. He manages to gain access to the house, which is guarded by the police.

name: Monkey See, Monkey Doo, Monkey Kiss You
description: Monkey See, Monkey Doo, Monkey Kiss You is a gripping first-person horror adventure. Stranded in a sinister forest, evade amorous monkeys while navigating treacherous paths. Face chilling encounters, uncover mysteries, and fight for survival in this pulse-pounding tale of fear and tension.

name: Hidden Clues: Gang Wars
description: New York is in need for daring detectives!

name: Barnacles Beers and Brawls
description: Barnacles, Beers, and Brawls is a fast-paced bar management game. You are a tavern bar manager in a world filled with plundering pirates and tentacled monstrosities. Hurry through a stylized map playing microgames themed around bartending duties like pouring a glass of beer or cleaning up a mess

name: Cardboard Chronicles
description: Welcome to Doodleburg! You play Doodle, a child who has been transported into a cardboard world of their own creation. Not all is well in the Burg of Doodle. An ancient, extradimensional evil has awoken and it's up to you to save this idyllic town from its ravenous rampage.

name: Summer Nightmare
description: Summer Nightmare is a game that shows the life of one of the people, a man who did not love his mother.He was born into a fatherless family, grew up on the streets, and was addicted to gambling.When he found his love, he did not move out from his mother, but brought his beloved to his parents' house

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Pack
description: You’ve built cars, airplanes, spaceships, boats, and everything in between. Now get ready to be a hero with the new Trailmakers Rescue Pack. Dress the part of one of modern society’s everyday heroes.

name: My Succubus Kukula
description: "My Succubus Kukula" is a cute pixel clicking game. Kukula, the succubus, suddenly barges into your house, and if you don't sign a contract with her, she'll kill you! ^o^, Save me!! Life and death are both in your hands, so be careful not to anger Kukula.

name: Piranha Feeding
description: Piranha Feeding is a thrilling action game with rogue-lite elements, where you control a voracious school of piranhas on a quest for the ultimate feeding frenzy. Conquer a succession of prey, ranging from smaller aquatic creatures to formidable adversaries, unlocking new abilities along the way.

name: Crowd Diver
description: Crowd Diver is an asymmetrical stealth multiplayer game where you can immerse yourself in the role of the Seeker, tasked with protecting the city from impending evil. Alternatively, you can become the Monster, seeking to wreak destruction and eliminate targets disguised.

name: Wishful Journey: Love Across Time
description: Xu yuan, who was a loser in real life traveled to an ancient palace. By transforming into the male protagonist, players will be in love with many beauties with different personalities, such as the unruly princess, the cold female assassin, embark on a love adventure that spans time and space.

name: Sacrifice For Sale
description: A unique choice heavy visual novel that you won't find anywhere else! Escape your grim fate, by arguing your case... Learn about the cultists who hold you captive, dismantle the cult, manipulate them- all to not end up as their next sacrifice!

name: Brand New World
description: You are given a chance to influence the development of your characters and settlement, forcing you to think strategically and make decisions that will affect the events in the game. Enjoy this immersive game experience where your every move will have meaning and consequences.

name: Harmonia: Full HD Edition
description: Set in a war-torn world in the distant future, the sci-fi kinetic novel "Harmonia" follows a mechanical boy and a human girl as they find their way to each other's hearts. Key's 15th anniversary title is back with full voice and FHD resolution, including the main character!

name: Tori Tamashii 2: Minna de Chicken-do Shindan
description: The battle to determine who is the bravest! Various critical situations will test your chicken level!

name: Treasure Defence
description: Treasure Defence is an award winning VR game that innovates on the classic tower defence genre. Play arcades, win towers and fight The Royal British Navy. Plunder gold from destroyed ships and fortify your pirate cove.

name: Urbek City Builder: Trains
description: Build an intricate web of trains and stations to connect your population for heightened productivity in work and science. Link key buildings like iron mines to steelworks for maximum industrial efficiency.

name: Suibotsu Haikyo no Piano Droid
description: Half a century has passed since wars broke out over land due to rising sea levels. Two shadows walk through the submerged ruins, moving from house to house in order to survive. Along the way, they arrive at a concert facility. There was a woman with long chestnut hair playing the piano.

name: Meta-Ghost: The Breaking Show
description: Immerse yourself in the reality show — "Breaking Show", where you engage in real-time battles with various intelligent machines using cybernetic enhancements and weapons. Whether for personal gain or lofty ideals. Fight! Until you reach the final victory on this Roguelike journey.

name: Shade: A Dog's Expedition
description: Join Shade, a loyal Border Collie, and his loving family as they navigate challenges, overcome obstacles, and celebrate the enduring bonds of love.

name: Retro Rally!
description: Get ready to embark on a nostalgic journey back to the golden era of arcade gaming with Retro Rally! This top-down racing game pays homage to the classic arcade racers of yesteryears, offering an adrenaline-pumping experience that will have you hooked from the moment you hit the accelerator.

name: Crystal Comet
description: Team up with your squad & take on the galaxy in this frantic twin stick space shooter "Squad em' up". Play single player with the AI or drop in / drop out local co-op!

name: Butterfly again
description: In a world where not everyone has magic, the kingdom is suffering from an infestation known as "Insect Demon". But only those who can use magic can see the Insect Demon...

name: DeadBlitz
description: A fast paced first-person action shooter set in a futuristic city overrun by zombies and robots. Feel the flow as you freely grapple and blast your way through a procedurally generated sci-fi city. Get satisfying kill streaks and challenge yourself by besting your best.

name: Oddsparks: An Automation Adventure
description: Design automated workshops for your odd and adorable Sparks to carry and craft everything, including more of themselves! Lead your squad of Sparks into combat. Explore a strange fantasy world, in single player or online co-op. Unearth the ancient mystery of the Sparks!

name: Masonic Mysteries: Secrets Unveiled
description: Unravel the secrets of the Masons and survive FBI's pursuit in The Cult Of Masons. High stakes and hidden dangers await.

name: Land of the Survivors
description: Roguelike-style survival game, enhance your character through upgrades. Survive as long as possible and fight against thousands of zombies.

name: Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers
description:
Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers is a kart racing video game originally based on the 3D Sonic the Hedgehog fan-game "Sonic Robo Blast 2", which itself is based on a modified version of Doom Legacy. It is the sequel to Sonic Robo Blast 2 Kart.

Hang up your sneakers, because Dr. Robotnik and his ex-enemies are going go-karting! Use the untapped potential of rings to super-charge your vehicle across more than 200 crazy courses. With over 20 unique items and some of the hottest moves on this side of the Floating Island, this is Racing at the Next Level!

name: Backrooms Break
description: Experience the ultimate psychological horror in Backrooms. Armed with only a hammer and revolver, you must fight for survival in a never-ending maze of abandoned rooms. Can you keep your sanity long enough to escape the clutches of the Backrooms?

name: Rotwood
description:
Hack and slash your way through the Rotwood in this rogue-like dungeon crawler developed by Klei Entertainment.

The world has been thrown into chaos, and it's up to you and your friends to battle the corrupted beasts of the Rotwood. Upgrade your gear, choose your preferred weapon, and hone your skills to defend your safe haven.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Sky Rider Starter Pack
description:
The Sky Rider Starter Pack includes a banshee set and 3,250 tokens to unlock new gear, weapons, and more!
The banshee set includes three different color patterns to customize your banshee.

name: Eco Farm Green
description: A clicker with global warming resource management in which your goal is to reduce your carbon footprint as much as possible while maintaining your plantation.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Pioneer Pack
description: Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, containing 1x Headquarters Custom Object (Honorable Flag) and 1x Early Bird Pack (1x Enhancement Rune & 1x Enhancement Accessory). Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Hope of the Alliance: Special HQ Statue
description: Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, containing 1x Special HQ Statue - (Nowa Haniwa) Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.

name: EverChest: Pamalos Chronicles
description:
Would you be willing to become a knight? Or a legendary lord? The only way is to keep fighting! Are you ready to embark on the journey, brave Adventurer? This is a mysterious exploration with both risks and opportunities. Dark demons, dragons, goblins, dwarves, and other fantasy living creatures await you! Defeat them to get treasure chests, the most powerful heroes, and the cutest pets, keep expanding your territory, and upgrade your status!

It's a world of inspired fantasy, with treasure chests that bring wealth and powerful gear. Are you ready to embark on this thrilling but rewarding adventure?

name: Rumble Club: Founder's Pack - Gold
description: 400 GemsSuper+ Rumble Pass, including exclusive Float On Emote!Founder's Pack Exclusive Skin: Founding PunchieFounder's Pack Exclusive Accessory: Founder's FlowFounder's Pack Exclusive Accessory: Quarter FounderFounder's Pack Exclusive Accessory: Founder Fries

name: Rumble Club: Founder's Pack - Bronze
description: The Rumble Club Founder's Pack - BRONZE comes with the following:Super Rumble PassFounder's Pack Exclusive Skin: Founding Punchie

name: Rumble Club: Founder's Pack - Silver
description: The Rumble Club Founder's Pack - SILVER comes with the following:100 GemsSuper+ Rumble Pass, which includes the exclusive Float On Emote!Founder's Pack Exclusive Skin: Founding PunchieFounder's Pack Exclusive Accessory: Founder's Flow

name: MechWarrior Online: Black Hawk-Ku Mech Pack
description: The Black Hawk-KU Mech Pack includes 2 New Variants Each with a standard Version and a Special Version with a 30% C-Bill Boost and Special Skin. Along with these 4 Mechs and Mech Bays we have included 3 extra omnipods for customization options, a title, badge, decal, and set of cockpit Items.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Apex Allstars Car Pack
description: Run through Mexico's finest roads in the 2018 BMW #1 BMW M Motorsport M8 GTE, 2015 Cadillac #3 Cadillac Racing ATS-V.R, 2020 Chevrolet #3 Corvette Racing C8.R, 2020 Lexus #14 VASSER SULLIVAN RC F GT3, and three more Apex All-Stars!

name: Wild Card Football: Legacy WR Pack
description: Play as famed legacy Wide Receivers Cris Carter, Steve Smith Sr. and Andre Reed, along with their unique Wild Card outfits.

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Whispers of Nature
description: Try 33 detailed pictures with busy backgrounds, ideal for puzzling, immerses you in the beauty of the natural world.

name: Meet My Teacher: Sport DLC
description: Fully unlock the SPORT Teacher library with 30 additional pictures! Extend your limit from 10 to 40 unlockable pictures.

name: Meet My Teacher: Chemistry DLC
description: Fully unlock the SPORT Teacher library with 30 additional pictures! Extend your limit from 10 to 40 unlockable pictures.

name: Meet My Teacher: Math DLC
description: Fully unlock the MATH Teacher library with 30 additional pictures! Extend your limit from 10 to 40 unlockable pictures.

name: Security Guard Sex: Episode 1
description: A visual novel series with animations about a guy working as a security guard at the mall. The first episode shows him confronting a woman who allegedly stole a phone from a mobile shop.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Season Pass
description: Eiyuden Chronicles: Hundred Heroes is designed to bring players a modern take on a classic JRPG experience. Get ready to lead 100+ playable characters through a war-torn world only you can save.

name: Arcade Fusion Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Trenchpunk
description: A dieselpunk Wolfenstein 3d inspired first person shooter.

name: Leechcraft
description:
As a plague spreads through the isolated village you call home, balance your needs as a newly-turned vampire with your duties as a healer.

Leechcraft is interactive fiction with a healthy dose of role-playing, steeped in a dark fantasy world inspired by medieval medicine.

name: Anarchitects
description:
With its intuitive drag-and-drop system and groundbreaking real time multiplayer physics, Anarchitects introduces a level of creativity and interaction never seen before in any video game.

Whether creating intricate puzzles, a 0 gravity team shooter, or board games, the possibilities within Anarchitects are limitless. Featuring little to no loading times, you can jump right into the action and start creating to you heart's content!

name: Capsule Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 3
description: You’ve seen her in a crown, now see her in Fortnite. Award-winning artist Billie Eilish is the Icon of Fortnite Festival Season 3!

name: Minecraft: Armored Paws
description: Minecraft: Armored Paws is a minor update for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition which adds content voted for at Minecraft Live 2023 by adding armadillos and wolf armor, while also adding 8 new wolf variants.

name: Minecraft: Armored Paws
description: Minecraft: Armored Paws is a minor update for Minecraft: Java Edition which adds content voted for at Minecraft Live 2023 by adding armadillos and wolf armor, while also adding 8 new wolf variants.

name: NFL 2K Playmakers
description: NFL 2K Playmakers is a mobile game featuring hundreds of cards to collect. Amass NFL players to construct the strongest rosters for offense, defense, and special teams. Level up your collection through gameplay and add equipment that will take your cards to the next level. Fill out your Playbook by collecting play cards that give you the perfect play to call for the victory.

name: The Tunnels of Saint Mercy Road
description: The Tunnels of Saint Mercy Road is an immersive horror experience that spans 4 areas, each unique and provides a different sense of unease. Inspired by games such as Silent Hill, Outlast, Resident Evil and many other (possibly surprising) games and stories, you will uncover the truth behind the urban legends of the tunnels under Saint Mercy Road.

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Oga Line (Akita to Oga) EV-E801 series
description: The Oga Line is a 26.4 km long line connecting Oiwake Sta. in Akita City, Akita Prefecture, to Oga Sta. in Oga City, Akita Prefecture.All trains operate directly to the Ou Line, and this DLC includes a 39.4 km long section, including a portion between Akita Sta. and Oiwake Sta. on the Ou Line.

name: Supermarket Shopping Simulator
description: Shopping Strategies: Beyond the Cart

name: Arena of Trophies
description: Join the epic battle in an arena filled with gladiators and test your skills in a game where every move can lead to glory or downfall. Collect achievements, refine your strategies, and become a legend in the endless fight for survival and recognition!

name: Remnant II: The Forgotten Kingdom
description:
In this 2nd DLC for REMNANT II, players will piece together the forgotten history of the lost tribe of Yaesha as they attempt to quell the vengeful wrath of an ancient stone spirit called Lydusa. Navigate the lingering traces of torment, treachery, and death that haunt the land's once proud ziggurats, as Lydusa's living stones wander the crumbling remnants of an ancient civilization in search of fresh blood. In a brand-new storyline, players must uncover the secrets of the lost tribe by exploring a mysterious new area within the world of Yaesha. In this strange new location, players will traverse new dungeons, acquire powerful gear—including a new Archetype, “The Invoker"— meet unexpected allies, and face new threats in their quest to return some semblance peace to the forgotten kingdom.

Features:
- New Storyline, Dungeons, and Area Based in the World of Yaesha
- New Archetype - The Invoker
- Many Items and Powerful Weapons that Enhance Gameplay
- New Bosses, Characters and Fearsome Creatures to Encounter

name: Crown Jewelz
description: Venture into enemy territory to retrieve the Queens precious jewels stolen from your realm.

name: Five Nights at Silver Pine
description: Fight for your life as creatures try to turn you into their next meal.

name: Hentai Senpai: Pirates!
description: Set sail on a steamy journey in Hentai Senpai: Pirates!! Solve puzzles to free over 150 sultry Buccaneers in dazzling 4K. Explore the gallery, choose yer favorites, and indulge in a pirate's paradise. ‍☠️🧩

name: Chaos Trigger
description: Go back and forth in a hail of bullets , use all kinds of weapons to take down your enemies.

name: Gunship DX
description:
Gunship DX is a rail shooter for the Nintendo Game Boy Color. Fight your way through five action-packed missions as you try to repel the attack and restore peace.

Gunship, the thrilling rail shooter for Game Boy, now upgraded with full-color graphics and added rumble feature!

name: Banana
description: Banana is a clicker Game, in which you click a Banana! In Banana you click the Banana to gain even more Bananas!!

name: ClockOut
description: It's time to leave the office. No overtime work. Let's hurry home.

name: Hentai Misuzu
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Usual
description: Enjoy the quiet life in the Japanese countryside. You can relax and spend your time doing some housework. A walk around the neighborhood and relaxing on the sofa in the sunlight will help you recover from the daily grind.

name: Metal Dogs EX Quest01: Here Comes the Metal Enemies
description: This is a DLC where you can play quests featuring additional monsters from the shooting action game "METAL DOGS".

name: Cyber Rush
description: Shoot your way through endless plagues of robots and use the game's advanced parkour and movement system to survive. Purchase special weapons and character upgrades to get stronger and survive more rooms!

name: Keep Up
description: Keep Up is a cute-as-heck 3D platformer! Explore giant worlds freely and reach new heights! In this action game, you will control a small dog with various jumping skills. Keep going up and find the path to the top.

name: SuperEat Man
description: After 6 years of self-exile, food delivery hero SuperEat Man returns to Pepper City to fight for his redemption and honor against him and his father's nemesis in this "stunt 'n gun" third-person shooter.

name: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 7 - Collector's Edition
description: AviGames presents the seventh game in the hidden object series of "Big Adventure: Trip to Europe". Embark on a journey through beautiful European countries and look for hidden objects in old Europe and Scandinavia, play exciting mini-games and collect souvenirs from different countries.

name: Leaving The Hospital
description: A difficult to control horizontal plate escape game, players control patients to escape from the hospital, the game has a difficult control system, the game includes two-person cooperation and two-person racing mode, hope to bring you some joy.

name: Monster United
description: This is a casual auto-battler game where you need to build your monster legion as you climb the tower! Random levels, rich alliances, and an equipment talent system provide countless possibilities for gameplay strategies, offering both casual relaxation and strategic depth!

name: Animal Shake
description: Meet adorable animal friends in the physics-based puzzle game Animal Shake. You can use physics to compensate for mistakes or aim for unexpected luck. It offers a variety of gaming experiences by mutations that change the game rules, along with distinct game modes, each with its own concept.

name: Hydrogen Game
description: A falling puzzle game where you drop 118 different elements and aim for a high score. You don't have to know the elements! Can you see the 118th element?

name: Wrath of Towers
description: In this game, your task will be to create a reliable defense that can withstand the onslaught of enemies. You will have to build various towers that will help you hold back the enemy advance.

name: Beyond
description: Beyond is a sci-fi turn-based strategy game set in a generated solar system that orbits a distant star every round. Play as one of five alien species as you race to collect resources, build your military, develop new tech, expand the area you control, and drive opposing factions from the system.

name: Urban Escape
description: Urban Escape is a first-person, fast paced parkour game. Go on an adventure in this toon world as the journey will take you across the earth and space. Pass through various challenges and hazards to reach your destination.

name: TopSpin 2K25: Grand Slam Edition
description: Compete on the world's biggest stages with the TopSpin 2K25 Grand Slam Edition! Get the Grand Slam Champions Pack, plus the Under the Lights Pack, New Wave Pack, Rookie Rise Pack, and the All Access Pass.

name: Cymut x Mutrobo: The Last Cymut
description: Cymut x Mutrobo: The Last Cymut is an action and strategy game where the Last Cymut, Watfrog, seeks to free his companions in the territory of the Mutrobos. He faces enemies and bosses in a world full of traps. Explore, collect items, and complete missions in this exciting adventure.

name: Boardwalk Arcade 2
description:
Boardwalk Arcade 2 is a sequel to the successful Party Arcade game. Boardwalk Arcade 2 offers a brand-new location on the boardwalk featuring exciting and classic mini games.

Boardwalk Arcade 2 features a collection of games that will be instantly familiar to anyone who’s been to a carnival or boardwalk. The more you play the more tickets you earn towards cosmetic upgrades, figurines, and collectibles!

name: DeMiriam Magic: Blueprint of Miracle
description: Create your sweet memories with the girls on the island, manage and build your own island in a relaxed atmosphere, operate the island's airport, and try driving a small plane to visit the island you have built

name: Sidereal Wanderer
description: As Captain, you must lead your spaceship to defeat the rebel forces scattered across the galaxy. Scour the sectors for enemies and remain alert! Determine the right coordinates and torpedo your foe down.

name: Fatermyth
description: An RPG game that combines tabletop role-playing and adventure. The storylines of seven characters from different eras intertwine, depicting an epic of human heroes. The strategic battles with dice + skills add more challenges to the adventure

name: Exosuit
description: Exosuit is a dynamic shooter in a unique style, where the focus is on maximizing the fun of gameplay. The game has no plot and the emphasis is only on unbridled action and unusual visual style.

name: Cyber Control
description: Cyber Control is a 3D puzzle platformer game set in a dystopian future, where the player controls either Jones Murdock or Jenny Li, rebels who need to escape from the cyber-neural network of the Alphas, a class of superhumans that dominate society.

name: Meet My Teacher
description: Today is the day, grab your backpack and meet your four new teachers. Which one will be your favorite and special one?

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Arcade: Wrath of the Mutants
description: A port of the arcade game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles released in 2017 which was based on the the 2012 Nickelodeon TV series. This port adds three new stages and six new boss battles to the gameplay of the original arcade game.

name: Tales of Kenzera: Zau
description: Tales of Kenzera: Zau is a 2.5D metroidvania developed by Surgent Studios and published under the EA Originals label. The game follows Zau, a young shaman who bargains with Kalunga, the God of Death, to revive his father. Players explore the mythological lands of Kenzera, using Zau's athletic abilities—such as double jumping, wall jumping, and air dashing—to traverse the environment. Equipped with the sun mask for melee attacks and the moon mask for ranged combat, Zau can upgrade both weapons along distinct paths. As players gain new skills, they unlock previously inaccessible areas, progressing through a world filled with ancestral spirits and powerful monsters.

name: At Tony's
description:
At Tony's is a first-person horror experience taking place in a haunted pizzeria.

The last night shift worker vanished mysteriously, it's your turn to step in to help the family's business.

Will you survive your shift, cooking pizzas while unveiling the restaurant's mysteries?

name: Reflectron
description: Reflectron is a geometrically-styled arcade game that will keep you coming back for more. Halfway between a brick-breaker and Geometry Wars, with a pinch of Vampire Survivors thrown in for good measure, it's a simple yet effective mix that will keep you coming back for more.

name: Rumble Club
description:
Fall into the physics-based massive multiplayer Battle Royale! Join the epic knockout madness with up to 20 clumsy players and punch, push, throw, or trick opponents out of the arena!

Fly in on Captain Punch’s Sky Yacht, get bopped into the arena, find silly Gadgets to battle with, and survive the dropping floor and shrinking battlefield to be the last player standing! Are you ready to punch your way to victory and become the ultimate champion?

name: Convrgence
description: Convrgence is an immersive single-player VR shooter with survival and horror elements. Explore the Chernokamensk exclusion zone: scavenge for loot, fight bandits and hunt for mystical artifacts. However be sure to return to base before duskfall, for when night arrives the hunter becomes the hunted.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Eiyuden Chronicles: Hundred Heroes is designed to bring players a modern take on a classic JRPG experience. Get ready to lead 100+ playable characters through a war-torn world only you can save.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Ermac
description: Announced for the Mortal Kombat 1: Kombat Pack, Ermac is a returning character previously playable in Mortal Kombat X as part of the main roster.

name: Super Mayor
description: A feel-good 2D platformer where you play as a councillor to a rural farming district in New Zealand! Solve problems, meet the public, and become MAYOR in this hilarious, story-rich adventure.

name: Hoversteppers
description: Hoversteppers is a freestyle hoverboard skating game. Flip, spin, and test your boarding skills with timed challenges across multiple stages.

name: Lunar Lander Beyond
description: Guide a roster of colorful pilots, eclectic advisors and state-of-the-art landers through a taxing series of missions. Deliver cargo, retrieve resources, and rescue stranded pilots as you navigate a mysterious universe of moons and planets.

name: Horror Cartridge Collection
description: A collection of retro styled games bundled together, experience many forms of horror in a wide array of styles whilst uncovering the mysteries of the old mall that holds them all.

name: Bellwright
description: Establish and expand your own settlements, liberate the land and assist its villagers, and recruit others to your cause while learning more about a life you had to leave behind. Command your forces, prove your valor through combat, and cement yourself as the hero of your people.

name: Sucker for Love: Date to Die For
description: Put the 'love' in 'Lovecraftian horror!' Hide from cultists and survive dangerous rituals to find a way out of the Black Woods!

name: Phantom Fury
description: Shelly “Bombshell” Harrison is back in this highly interactive mix of first person action and road movie adventure. Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey around the USA. Use an enormous arsenal of weapons and skills to battle treacherous soldiers and vile mutants, all while trying to save mankind.

name: Jawbreaker
description: Let’s play hide-and-seek with serial killers. Jawbreaker is a psychological horror game that will have you running, hiding, and fighting to survive a terrifying gang-infested society on the verge of collapse. Though that’s not all, once the sun goes down the true fear will begin...

name: Heart of Crown Online
description: The great emperor's untimely death... Seven princesses are candidates for his succession! Who will save the empire from chaos? An online deck-growing card game where you grow your deck and fight for the Princess.

name: Hearts 3D Premium
description: Hearts 3D Premium brings a lot of game variants, challenging opponents and game environments with great 3D graphics on your PC.You can play in Singleplayer offline or LAN and Online Mode! The full animated Tutorial explains rules of the popular card game step by step.

name: The Dust of the Violet Crystals
description: A flesh-eating dust leaves you to survive alone against hordes of Listless.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes
description: Eiyuden Chronicles: Hundred Heroes is designed to bring players a modern take on a classic JRPG experience. Get ready to lead 100+ playable characters through a war-torn world only you can save.

name: Rise of the Pawn
description: Rise of the Pawn is a chess and poker hybrid strategy game.

name: Sumerians: Assyrian Statues
description: Assyrian statues to decorate your cities.

name: Convrgence: Supporter Pack
description: CONVRGENCE - Supporter Pack is little addition that mainly aimed at those who already own the game, but wish to support an indie solo developer a bit more nonetheless.

name: Ooooo
description: A 82 exit level hack for Super Mario World by JUMP Team and Kevin centered around green bean-based gimmicks and challenges.

name: Let's Puzzle: Verdant Realms Pack
description: Dive into nature-themed designs, from lush forests to majestic mountains, and customize your game with new puzzles, dynamic mouse cursors, serene menu backgrounds, tranquil music, and elegant text fonts. Tailor your gaming environment to your taste, activating and deactivating elements at will.

name: Angel Legion: Shadow Woven - Green
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Meow Bistro!
description:
Manage your own small and cute bistro well and become rich, meow!
Hello Boss, Meow!
Welcome to "Meow Bistro", meow!
In this game, you buy ingredients at the dawn market,
create dishes with these ingredients at your bistro,
and sell them to earn money, meow!
Buy fresh ingredients at the best prices, turn them into dishes, and sell them to customers to earn money, meow!

name: Super Sunburnt Siesta Snoozer
description: A playdate game where you crank to control an umbrella.

name: Discontrolled
description: Remember what you've picked up to make your way through this puzzle-platformer. PlayJam 5 Winner!

name: Cazzarion: Speed Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure
description:
An evil magician has stolen the Enchanted Chalice and has hidden it somewhere in the Kingdom. The object of the game is to rescue the Enchanted Chalice and place it inside the Golden Castle where it belongs.

This is no easy task, as the Evil Magician has created three Dragons to hinder you in your quest for the Golden Chalice. There is Yorgle, Grundle and Rhindle.

There are 3 castles in the Kingdoom: the White Castle, the Black Castle and the Golden Castle. Each castle has a gate over the entrance. The Gate cas be opened with the corresponding colored Key. Inside of each Castle are rooms (or dungeons), depending at which Skill Level you are playing.

The Castles are seperated by rooms, pathways and labyrinths.

name: Horas Extra Terrestres
description: Sin descripción

name: Flat & Fluffy
description: Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing world of Flat&fluffy , where captivating jigsaw puzzle mechanics meet an eclectic collection of over 100 stunning images featuring furry, sci-fi, fantasy, monster and goth girls.

name: Oh No! I Died and Woke Up a Greek God!
description: Oh No! You died and were reborn as a god on Mount Olympus! Your goal is to find a way back to Earth! The problem? Gods keep falling in love with you! Go on dates, party through the night, and find out what’s happening on this crazy mountain!

name: Crystal Guardian
description: Crystal Guardian is a tower defense game featuring survival and time control elements. Defend the crystal against enemies from different biomes every night, and during the days, gather resources from various biomes to alleviate hunger and thirst, aiming to survive until the 100th day.

name: Hide And Seek
description: 'Hide And Seek' is a game where you collect items to escape the house that has been merged with the school you went to and turned into a complicated maze. Escape the randomly generated house and win the bet!

name: StarsKnight
description: This is a game that constantly iterates and updates. Before the final version, different gameplay will be updated to get through the iteration period. The final iteration of the game's main mode will be a galactic demon city game with a big map and a big story background!

name: Odd Sequence
description: Odd Sequence is an indie-action game with armed bots and RPG elements in platformer gameplay. Geometric characters and a flat, minimalist art style give this game its uniqueness. Odd Sequence focuses heavily on the combat aspect and the attack customization.

name: Scarecrow vs. Big Butt Birds
description: Defend crops as a scarecrow with a hand-tapped gun. Aim carefully against plump, persistent birds. Enjoy tacos in this quirky simulator!

name: Cringegolf
description: If you think playing golf is easy, then try playing Cringegolf! Your nerves will be tested, and your composure will be questioned.

name: Minesweeper
description: Classic, Hex, 3D or Endless! Want to play Minesweeper to pass the time? Play the classic original or try some new unique takes on it!

name: Is This A Platformer?
description: Play a fast paced action platformer where you fight grapes and a banana to save your dump brother.

name: Le monde d'orathos
description: The elf world wanted to learn creation magic, but the kingdom didn't want it. The king decided to create an island for any inhabitant who wanted to leave, but no return was possible. A young elf wanted to act... He discovered something strange that the king was hiding.

name: The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty
description: A travel text adventure game with Chinese traditional style. Player will escort four girls to Luoyang in order to discover the truth and make decisions along the way. This game involves themes of “Revenge, Cannibalism, etc.” the darker sides of life, but still expect to convey a positive emotion.

name: Tech Shop Simulator
description: Manage your own tech shop. Arrange the shelves, buy the products, put them at the price you want and sell them. Expand, organize and upgrade the shop. Hire and manage employees.

name: The Anomalous Hour
description: You are alone in a deserted station. Or are you? Take pictures of strange anomalies around the station and you might find a way out.

name: Cotton Candy's Terror Factory
description: A Sweet and strange horror experience, you are Contestant 9127.

name: Dream Fish
description: This is a simple game!

name: Storm's Eye
description: As a Runner, master your environment and claw your way through the endless stream of corrupted monsters chasing you. Gear yourself up on the drops of your adversaries, recycle or upgrade it, and complete objective to move forward. But beware of the Storm !

name: Assassin's Belief
description: This is an interesting balloon game where balloons appear randomly from the edge below the stage and disappear when they rise to the edge above the stage.

name: SimRail: The Railway Simulator - Cargo Pack
description: Lead heavy freight trains with the legendary ET22 locomotive and new wagons. Conquer challenging missions and haul up to 3000 tons across Polish railways!

name: Dice Guess
description: A minimalistic logic game where you predict the number the dice will display face up after a roll. Discover tricks and strategies to eliminate luck from the equation and ascend to become the ultimate dicempion.

name: Dadish 3D
description: Explore an exciting world, face off with fast-food themed foes, and reunite Dadish with his missing children in this challenging 3D platforming adventure.

name: LightGone
description: Step into the darkness with Ashley, a college dropout lost in a mysterious world devoid of light. Traverse eerie liminal locales and evade lurking monsters to unravel the mysteries of this chilling 2D game with horror elements. Can you lead Ashley to safety, or will the shadows consume her?

name: Emoji Survival
description: Embark on an epic journey, facing thousands of enemies in our Emoji Roguelike

name: Cursed Despair
description: Cursed Despair offers a chilling experience where you and your friends will face a mysterious monster, plunging into deep despair. Gather the necessary items to survive, perform the ritual, and stand firm amidst the darkness.

name: Alphageddon
description: Throw asteroids on them, raise their sea levels and even make the whole moon fall on their heads! This is only a fraction of what you'll have to do to make sure your perfect creation is safe in this game mixing fast reflexes, strategy and lots of fire and destruction.

name: Droplette
description: Droplette is a cozy puzzle platformer where a spirited girl named Droplette learns and uses element-based abilities on the environment around her to rescue the droplet boy, Driplet! Shoot versatile projectiles and transform through obstacles in this watery world.

name: Forest Keeper
description: Survival Horror set on a sinister island. As a lone forest keeper, you'll unravel its grim secrets from the eerie backstory of a royal vacation home turned nightmare. Journey through the changing seasons, from day to night. Confront nightmarish abominations that emerge in the winter cold.

name: Dental Strike
description: A throwback to retro shoot'em up games typical of the 80s, where you play as a tooth fairy fighting against rotten teeth and bacteria using different abilities and special shots.

name: Pirates. Naval battle
description: This is a hardcore game, and it's not the easiest control. But if you can acquire combat skills, then exciting battles with pirate ships are waiting for you.

name: The Final Farewell
description: The Final Farewell is a cosy narrative adventure about finding peace in death, and learning to let go. As a lost ghost, befriend wayward mortals and piece together misty memories. Lay to rest the echoes of the past and discover the truth of your own demise.

name: Rama's Quest
description: Embark on a legendary journey in "Rama's Quest," a captivating rogue-lite bullet hell rooted in the rich tapestry of Indian mythology.

name: I Commissioned Some Ladybugs 3
description: I paid more artists to hide ladybugs and aphids in 20 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Bridges & Docks
description: Build the island of your dreams - either by hand or using procedural generation tools. Adjust the quantity of bridges, the maximum height of the terrain - even how close trees are! Meticulously tweak all the configurations to generate uniquely enthralling island worlds!

name: A Story About Farting
description: The most beautiful story in the world of games! An innovative clicker where you fart and burp your way through earning achievements! Visit Old Mushroom's hut, welcome Fatty and feed him until he explodes! Fart, burp and have a great time!

name: Armor Blitz
description: Armor Blitz is a perfect couch game with friends or go online to battle in various multiplayer modes. Destroy other tanks, grab boosts and navigate through dozens of maps in single player or co-op campaigns; fight other players in PVP or teams mode in this game that hearkens back to the classics.

name: House of Chavez
description: In this visual novel, play as Adriana and travel to Europe with her brother Bruno and meet Silke, who attended to Adriana's grandmother Maria during her final moments. Explore House Chavez's shadowy hallways. Unveil secrets, delve into their profound connection, and navigate the mysteries within.

name: Shadow of the Depth
description: Shadow of the Depth is a top-down action Roguelite game. Delve into a dungeon world of light and shadow to eradicate the monsters that ravage your home. Be prepared to step into the abyss before you!

name: Mycelium Guardians
description: Isometric strategy game, you command a collective of fungi in a post-apocalyptic Earth. Utilize mycelium to build structures, manage resources, and mitigate environmental threats. Your choices shape the balance between life and desolation. Engage in strategy to be Earth's final line of defense

name: EX-Xdriver
description:
EX-Xdriver is a hardcore racing-rhythm game with a diverse songlist of high-energy tracks.
With over 50 featured artists and tons of fun but challenging charts, you'll always find yourself pushing for intense clears and higher scores.
Alongside standard button controls, EX-Xdriver features analog stick gear shifting and gyro-controlled drifting to keep gameplay dynamic and engaging.
Whether playing solo, or in competitive multiplayer, use drifting to your advantage and go for a new record!

name: Honey Bunny
description: Honey Bunny is a bartender at Lucky Rabbit's Foot Casino, the cutest casino in all of Starlight City! She's busy at work when the no-good gang, The Cool Cats, steals away the casino and the entire city's supply of cocktail cherries. Chase them down as Honey Bunny using your ears to headbutt enemies, grab items, and platform around the city as you recover as many cherries as possible!

name: Dimension Omega
description: Explore, survive and escape the numerous levels of Dimension Omega in order to return to the real world in a creepy, liminal and eerie First-Person-Singleplayer experience while avoiding various terrifying entities that lurk in the shadows, waiting for you...

name: Swarm Grinder
description: Swarm Grinder is an action roguelite hypercore game with pixel art graphics. Battle enemies to make your way through a mass of spreading cells hosting dormant enemies. Collect a variety of game-changing skills and upgrades to create unique builds.

name: Ashen Knights: Foreshadow
description: Two heroes, two different genres: souls-like & hack’n’slash. They switch places and trigger a wild emotional storm making sure you never get bored of playing. Assay your strength and stamina as a defender of the Abyss-devoured world. Be merciless yet cautious in Ashen Knights: Foreshadow.

name: BlockStar VR
description: BlockStar is a VR shooter where you put your reflexes to the test shooting cubes and completing challenges in an action-packed futuristic tournament. Play the 40-mission story mode and show that you have what it takes to become a filthy-rich champion.

name: Sweet Transit
description: Sweet Transit is a unique city builder where the railway is king and trains are the sole means of transportation. Quaint villages will expand to bustling cities, farms to industrious factories, and steam-powered rail to combustious diesel... and beyond in this interconnected, train-driven world.

name: Innsmouth
description: A ZX Spectrum text adventure game inspired by the novel "The Shadow over Innsmouth" written by H.P Lovecraft.

name: Dahlia
description:
Dahlia is a very short sapphic visual novel made in under 36 hours for the Velox Formido game jam, a jam for shortform visual novels. survive being trapped with a lovely little vampire, or don't.

This game is 2.3k words long and has 3 endings. It's playable in English and French.

name: Metaball: Face Bundle
description: A set of 3 different face styles. Refresh your mood with a different-looking face than usual! Our face pack is reasonably priced! Don't miss out!

name: Piano: Learn and Play - Ultra Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Graviteam Tactics: The Far Escape
description: Soviet troops of the SWF were encircled near Kiev. CMG Belov received the order of advance to the Romny to provide support to the encircled troops. In order to prevent a breakthrough of the encirclement ring, the German HQ strengthened the outer perimeter with elements of 10MID and MID SS "Reich".

name: FaithEater
description: In a world where humans hunt the Gods for a chance at hope, you have betrayed the Faith Eaters. Given the highest punishment, you've been thrown into the Cathedral at the End of the World, where the God of Death Muerte has been imprisoned. You expect it to devour you without mercy. Instead, it offers you hope. The very same hope the Faith Eaters have taken away.

name: Search and Rescue: Snowman From Outer Space
description: SNOWMAN from OUTER SPACE!Snowman from Outer Space appeared in nearby mountains!Save yourself or Fight them if You dare!

name: Hentai Stars: Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Flowers of Asphodel
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of the Astera Stone
description: Sin descripción

name: Rosy Rubicunda
description: A small 4-map (+ 1 intro and 1 credits map) collaborative wad between OverflowingMocha and Stephyesterday. Features somewhat tough microslaughter and a cute color palette.

name: An Alt Girl for Skoof
description: There is a rumor that any skuf can legally receive a fee alt girl from the state; to do this, you just need to log in to a special service and enter your personal data.

name: Stellfire
description: Action Third-Person Open World shooter set on the derelict space base, deploy as a powerful fire-racing unit and conquer strength with Weapon founds across unique locations, destroy everything on your way to get through rageous enemies, as well as monstrous bosses waiting to be discovered.

name: You Are My Treasure
description: “You are my Treasure” is a swashbuckling pirate comedy visual novel and yuri dating sim. Play as Captain Carmen “Cards” Rodriguez as she goes on an epic adventure across the Caribbean to find the booty of her dreams.

name: Hotel Perkkow and the Two Vegetarian Werewolves
description: Let's keep it simple. Detective arrives to Bucarest. Missing guest in a small hotel. And hawaian pizza. If you want to know how those things blend together... Just press the start button.

name: The Last Hospital
description: Every decision made influences humanity's fate, with USMLE level medical questions woven into patient care, revealing the mysteries of a dying world.

name: Race Elcano
description: The new car is not electric, nor is it a flying car. The new car is a one-button driving car. Control the direction and speed of the car simultaneously with a single button. To turn you also accelerate and to accelerate you also turn, difficult to master but intuitive.

name: Evil Beneath
description: In this retro PS1/PSX style game. Play as a reporter (Rosa Salinas) investigating strange phenomenon regarding people mysteriously disappearing after visiting a particular mansion located deep inside a forest. During your investigation you will encounter horrifying creatures ready to tear you limb from limb and devour you alive. Traverse your way through these monstrous creatures and discover the terrifying truths about the mansion in the forest, while trying to make your escape before it's to late.

name: The New Denpa Men
description:
Scour radio waves for the Denpa Men: small creatures that call these invisible signals their home.

The New Denpa Men is a free-to-play RPG where you can collect these Denpa Men for your party and adventure with them as your companions. In addition to the main adventure, you can decorate your island, fish, participate in limited-time events, and play against other players.

name: Bulletz
description: Bulletz is a chaotic local multiplayer twin stick shooter with over 40 guns and levels. You play a series of rounds in destructible levels trying to kill your opponents with guns that randomly spawn. The first player to 10 kills wins the match!

name: Methods: The Illusion Murders
description: Detective Red July must stop a serial killer who patterns his murders after optical illusions in this mystery visual novel set in the world of Methods.

name: The Dwarf
description: Fight against darkness and take Thaldoh's vengeance. And then accompany the hero Thaldoh's struggle and let grace fulfill itself. Discover mystery and revenge in a fantastical world with a new Role-playing game.

name: Is It Wrong To Try To Rescue Monster Girls From The Inquisition?
description: Solve otherworldly puzzles, rescue quirky monster girls and uncover the secrets of the kingdom together in this light-hearted isekai visual novel.

name: WW2: Bunker Simulator - Origins
description: Take control of the Wehrmacht officer, the original commander of the bunker, before the 101st Airborne Division took him out. Together with your subordinates try to stop the Allies Normandy offensive. The tables have turned!

name: Stories of the Dreaming World
description:
Stories of the Dreaming World is a collection of short stories put together in RPG Maker VX Ace. Though some of them may seem unrelated, they are small pieces of a bigger puzzle.

The stories follow the perspectives of different characters involved with a certain world. An immortal alchemist. The fledgling god of a newborn world. A homunculus and the weight of knowing.

And perhaps more?

name: Zlalox
description: You control a tiny sprite that consists of a pair of vertical lines, and you have to manoeuvre it through various obstacles in 15 vertically scrolling levels.

name: Mojito the Cat: Sushi Skins
description: Expand your cube-shaped friend collection with this 4 new sushi based skins

name: Ping Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Ultimate Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Hentai World: Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Diortem
description: Fight for survival in this metroidvania where you are an unkillable parasitic organism that can invade other life forms and use their abilities for your own gain.

name: Combat Jam 1
description: Mappers were given 48 hours to make a combat focused level. No fancy textures. No lighting. No detailing. Just pure gameplay. It features multiple unique combat scenarios, a hub map and a boss fight.

name: Fishing Blast
description: Sin descripción

name: Kuon no Kanata
description: Sin descripción

name: Can Do!
description: A cozy(ish) game about sorting and stocking grocery store shelves.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - 420 Pack
description: Celebrate 420 with new cosmetic items for SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! Featuring cool outfit items for your New Kid.

name: Drawing Carnival: Horror Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Start with 50 Gold Coins
description: This is an easy to use but difficult to pass game. It is suitable for players who like challenges and constantly break through themselves. You need to use your skills, strategies and resource management skills flexibly to survive and grow in this experience.

name: I Got Sticky with a Femboy
description: Anticipation makes the "heart" grow fonder.

name: Omega Mouse Zero
description: Enter the Omega-Verse, a captivating Metroidvania, Multiverse adventure where each dimension guards secrets waiting to be uncovered. Immerse yourself in the dynamic world of this 2.5D platform/shooter and discover the thrilling blend of exploration and action that awaits!

name: Risky Chronicles and the Curse of Destiny
description: Embark on the role of Risky, our fearless adventurer, in an epic 2D and 3D adventure! Explore the enchanting worlds of this modern platform/adventure game.

name: Whispers of Silence
description: Dive into the haunting narrative of "Whispers of silence" a first-person exploration game where every object tells a story and every note reveals a fragment of the past.

name: Sinister Hospital
description: In the dark forests of Duskwood town, an abandoned hospital rises ominously. Despite its closure years ago, "Sinister Hospital" harbors terrifying secrets. The player enters to follow the trail of a group of lost children from the town. There lies a dark journey and quest for justice: Judge Harlan.

name: Unnatural Selection
description: Four Player Party-Shooter Featuring Cute Animals Wielding Wacky Guns! Play as animals and fight your friends to win the tournament, eliminating the most players to win the round!

name: Starpoly
description: Discover strategic depth in our space board game! Use star-currency to buy interstellar sites. Compete with friends in turn-based matches, utilizing the Starbridge for tactical advantage. Accumulate currency for the Lottery, offering rewards and site boosts. Achieve cosmic success

name: The Croaker
description: A 2D platformer with tons of features, including a level editor, level sharing, XP, and leaderboards!

name: Idle Battle RPG
description: А unique combination of idle game with RPG elements. Fight with enormous monsters, upgrade your stats, buy outfit and use prestige to get permanent power ups. But once your are dead the journey starts from the very beginning!

name: Unbreaded
description: Unbreaded is a side-scrolling adventure game where you navigate a gingerbread man through a bakery battleground, blending puzzle-solving with dynamic combat against animated kitchenware, all set within a heartfelt story of creation and rebellion against industrialization.

name: Event World VR
description: Your #1 venue for performances and shows! This game is a way to submerge yourself metaversally in the full musical and theatrical experience. Event VR is holding a multitude of different shows and concerts. This game also will allow you to go to shows with your friends and play mini rogue games.

name: Where Dragon Spirits
description: The Dragon Spirits series crossover search game will keep your eyes busy. Find all the hiding Dragon Spirits. Well hand-drawn 4K scenes filled with adorable dragons. Short gameplay that won't take up too much of the player's time. Very easy to grab all achievements.

name: Cybersex: Lust Story
description: Welcome to the world of Cybersex: Lust Story – an enthralling visual novel for adults, where you become the architect of your own destiny, interacting with a mysterious android being that encapsulates uniqueness and distinction.

name: Diary of a Stoner
description: Wander through the Stoner Universe and Duel with Magical Cards! Will you use your power for Good? Or Evil? Many different endings are available depending on the choices you make. You are about to embark on a wonderous stoned adventure!

name: Hentai Casino
