description: Your girlfriend is asking you for money, so you face a tough choice: Work hard to advance in your job, and perhaps your boss will reward you ;) OR Go to casino and trust your luck. Win money and unlock new girls!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Weather
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Rooms
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Sheryl: The Alchemist of the Island Ruins
description: Play as Sheryl, a purehearted alchemist, who must gather ingredients and craft them into items and medicine, in her journey to become a five star atelier!

name: Cleaning The World With Pampam
description: Help Pampam eliminate the incorrectly disposed garbage to save nature in this cute and super different educative infinite runner game! Evade obstacles, fight bosses and use a variety of powers-ups to clean the world!

name: Your Turn to Disembark
description: Your Turn to Disembark is an episodic narrative game about a weird train and the passengers that are trapped inside of it. Will you make it out of the train or will you be trapped onto it's route for the rest of days?

name: Para: Rime of Zealot
description: Para: Rime of Zealot is a 2D side-scrolling suspenseful thriller adventure game.It is inspired by the ancient mariner's tale.You will take on the role of the protagonist, Lovan, navigating the pressures of survival while uncovering the truth behind the events.

name: Project_Y: Working Title
description: 360° live-action ghost horror VR. What will befall you when you watch people involved in urban legends?

name: Alien Tag
description: Alien Tag is an free, immersive VR game that puts you in the shoes of an extraterrestrial trying to tag other aliens!

name: Bewitching Sinners
description: Bewitching Sinners is a dark comedy dating sim where your choices will either leave you with a your own witch-hunting man or ruin a whole world and potentially killing millions of people within it, no pressure! Explore a fantasy world full of witches, hot priests, and maybe some run-ins with death.

name: The Rush
description: The Rush is a horizontally scrolling shoot 'em up with graphics inspired by classic space shooters of the MSX. Buckle up and see if you have what it takes to master the highly adaptive Chameleon Quartz space fighter, single-handedly obliterate the alien invaders, and overcome The Rush!

name: Tinytown
description: Tinytown is a cozy building strategy and puzzle game where you create a small city by placing new buildings. Manage resources, upgrade buildings and use all the small space to build your dream city!

name: Vaporwave Road VR
description: Drive a car on an endless road, listen to music, and watch the scenery. This is a relaxing game, you can import local music, in the game you can only listen to music and enjoy the scenery. This game is completely made for the VR experience and contains 7 music.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Ultra Premium
description: Sin descripción

name: Witch & Fieriness
description:
Witch & Fieriness is an action-packed adventure beat-them-up game where you take on the role of "Flameryn," the Fire Witch, who embarks on a journey to find her lost sister, "Iceika." Armed with powerful magic, Flameryn can overcome all defensive and offensive obstacles.

However, despite her fiery prowess, Flameryn is vulnerable to sunlight! Players must navigate carefully and prioritize finding water sources to keep her cool and prevent her from being overwhelmed by the scorching rays.

name: Immortal Desires: Book 2
description: Immortal Desires, Book 2 is the second book of the Immortal Desires series. It succeeds its first book, Immortal Desires, Book 1 and is followed by Immortal Desires, Book 3.

name: Zelda II: Paracosm
description: This is a rom hack designed out of love for Zelda II. It has always had a dreamlike atmosphere to it, and this new adventure really leans into that aspect. Work on this hack started in summer of 2021 with the intention of only making a slightly dreamier variant of the original, but it slowly became its own distinct project. It features new overworlds, towns, dungeons, graphics, and text.

name: Chaos Chain: Supporter Cosmetic Pack 3
description: The Supporter Cosmetic Pack 3 is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and to help me continue to be able to improve the game. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

name: X8: NEO-19 White DLC
description: Blast the competition away in style with the NEO-19 White Pack!

name: X8: Fallen Angel DLC
description: Descend upon the battlefield in blazing fury and infernal fire with the Fallen Angel Pack!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 03
description: Season 3 Episode 3: Gamers of the Galaxy! Mini struggles through the Cool-Kid-infested VR game, Underwatch 2000, to get ahold of the elusive Game Girl.

name: HoloParade: DLC with BGM and Costume - Shirakami Fubuki
description: This DLC unlocks Shirakami Fubuki's swimsuit costume and the BGM "KONKON Beats" in HoloParade, and activates a gift code that allows you to scout Shirakami Fubuki. The BGM can be set for all UR talents, changing the music when the talents march to liven up the parade!

name: Angel Legion: Charming Mystery - Red
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Beat of Montezuma
description:
Rhythm and music style game with 80-s vibes will surprise you with new mechanics.
Go through portal labyrinths of the mysterious supreme idol and collect all coins.
Don't waste time, feel the rhythm of Montezuma!

name: Round My Corners
description: Round My Corners transforms your desktop with smooth, rounded edges, seamlessly integrated for a sleek look. Customize effortlessly, enjoy low resource consumption, and elevate your digital experience. Join the Round Corner Cult and embrace the future of desktop aesthetics today!

name: Nine Floors
description:
In Nine Floors, you are a student who has finished the horror of high school classes.

Avoid your classmates, you don't want trouble, that evil janitor... he surely won't let you go home...
How scary, go down the nine floors, and if you find something strange... Turn back and return the way you came.

name: One Night: Burlesque - Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Piano
description: Start the whisker-tickling Fun with Cat Piano.

name: Crank Defense Force
description: An alien invasion threatens to destroy all life on Playtopia! Crank Defense Force remote missile pilots are the planet's last hope. Defend your cities as long as you can.

name: Comuni Non Comuni
description:
Choose the real Italian Municipality between the two options provided. Very easy!

Comuni Non Comuni is a simple, fast, immediate and engaging game. You will be shown two names: one is a real Italian municipality, the other is a name generated with an ad hoc algorithm.

name: Swordsman on the Eternal Journey
description:
Let's go on a journey to break the lewd demonization curse placed on the main character, Mr. Swordsman.

A swordsman who was a soldier in the royal capital on the northern continent, but was cursed by the "Demon Lord," a powerful demon, to become a lewd demon. During his wandering journey, he received a blessing from the spirit of the fountain and was able to control the curse to some extent. In order to completely break the curse, he sets out on a journey.

name: Silver Thread: Deux
description:
Do ghosts actually exist?

In this sequel to Silver Thread, an exorcist that doubts the existence of ghosts might sound contradictory, but to Alicia Wilkershire, this is the right way to get closer to the truth. After hearing rumors of a haunted theater, Alicia was hired to investigate...but what will she find there?

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Kohana
description: Chasing bad guys, investigating crimes, helping citizens, and lots of paperwork! Just another day in the life of a city police officer.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Party Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Traffic Manager: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Multi Maze 3D: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Rin
description: Rin always manages to make her patients feel better. Come lie down on the bed, relax, and show her where it hurts.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Misuzu
description: Misuzu is trained in many forms of combat. Students come from far away, eager to learn from her. Sometimes, her lessons can be painful.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Tabletop Terror
description: 1 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Classic Tabletop Board Game themed ultra-wide table with multiple playfields!

name: Hentai Homewrecker
description: Ready to make your debut as a hot available bachelor after moving to the big city, are you ready to go from inexperienced virgin to the stud for the horniest housewife in town?!

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Wakana
description: Wakana spends all day at the beach. When she isn't watching over swimmers, Wakana loves sunbathing and having fun in the water.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Yui
description: Order something from the menu, or choose one of Yui's daily specials! Yui has a natural talent for cooking, and her customers leave very satisfied.

name: Anime Girl Puzzles: Akari
description: Akari works hard all day at the hotel. There are so many things to do, with new guests arriving all the time. She just wants a break!

name: Meranbaralan
description: "Meranbaralan" is an exhilarating action game where you burn and destroy a moving wooden fortress called "Onbu".Players will take on the role of a salamander and will board the Onbu, spitting flames, and use bombs to completely destroy the city before it reaches the city!

name: Elementaire
description: Try to clear different cells by combining the colors together. The more cleared before all colors have been cleared the better your score. 50 levels and 3 difficulties to try out, you'll be puzzling for hours!

name: Hentai Uniform
description: Hentai Uniform is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Central Killing Agency
description: In this 2d pixel art game, it's 1953 and you're playing as an agent hired by the Central Killing Agency to kill Fred Olsen. Experience multiple endings in this short, narrative-driven adventure.

name: Cargo Master Transporter
description: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey as you assume the role of a seasoned Cargo Master Transporter in this pulse-pounding gaming adventure.

name: DogDogDog
description: "DogDogDog" is a horror adventure game set in modern times. Recently, you have been feeling like someone is stalking you, making you anxious with the feeling of being watched and hearing noises everywhere. Suddenly, you recall your past pet dog, only to encounter a "DOG" in the present.

name: Hentai Tales: The Neko Returns
description: You once lived a happy life with your three adopted cats, but one day they died. When you grieve at their graves, a miracle happens. The cats have transformed into catgirl and come to repay you for your kindness in raising them. What will happen?

name: Body Pay
description: Body Pay is a casual puzzle game where you pay for products brought by customers by pressing the appropriate control keys. As you move up the stage, overcome the increasing number of products and customer interruptions to achieve the target score and continue your secret story with the girls.

name: WC Dream
description: You are the KING of your own throne, capable of creating anything you desire. YOU are the KING!

name: Last Ride
description: A Train Ride to ... where exactly? A short atmospheric Horror Game about an unusual Train Ride where you need to find your way through a Train to see what lies behind.

name: Desert Of The Undead New Frontiers
description: Slaughter the undead to save your town in this 8 bit action run-n-gun

name: Multiplayer Spiders
description: Multiplayer Spiders - You and Your steam spider friends must stop the invading spiders from spinning their web of fear.

name: Necrophobia
description: Start your life anew at Heaven's Gates Academy. Learn new subjects, make new friends, experience what you've never before deemed possible. Change your fate, and the fate of those around you- your decisions matter greatly.

name: Aston
description: The aim of the game is to find the passwords of the encrypted doors in the rooms and finish the game.

name: Trivia Trials
description: It's about Trial and Error. Show your resilience by passing all 20 random Questions and Riddles before your Time runs out, or admit to your weakness and surrender. It's your choice. Do you have what it takes?

name: Sticky Clicker!
description: A thrilling clicking adventure!

name: Run Run Bird!
description: Embark on a whimsical journey into the enchanting world of our beloved animal friends with "Run Run Bird!"

name: Mereonozis 2D: The Kingdom of Gremlins
description: A puzzle-bazed metroidvania. Help the robot to repair the station. But there are gremlins who will try to break everything you've just fixed!

name: RocketRecoil
description: Change the past by propelling yourself towards the future. Or something like that. Just blow yourself up with rockets to move around. The game's hard to play.

name: Koishi Adventure
description: Koishi Adventure is a 2D top-down slash-and-shoot Touhou Project doujin RPG, where you'll be adventuring in the absurd and brutal world of Lotusland from the perspective of the Komeiji Koishi~ In the game, you can explore dungeons, collect equipments, and constantly strengthen your party~

name: Pals Go Only Up!
description: Welcome to Pals Go Only Up! Get ready for a wild ride up the mountainside. It's not your average climbing game; here, precision is everything. Brace yourself for some real nail-biting moments as you navigate through challenging cliffs and obstacles.

name: SEX HELP
description: SEX HELP - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Gunstorm II
description: Gunstorm II is an space-shooter with bags of playability, character, pretty weapons, and lots of fun. The plot-based action takes you to five different worlds, in a perfectly balanced game that starts easy and gradually gets more difficult.

name: Girl's Memories
description: "Girl's Memories," an enchanting PC game that invites you into a world of captivating beauty and thrilling adventure! Immerse yourself in stunning artwork meticulously crafted by renowned artists, bringing to life a diverse cast of mesmerizing characters.

name: Minako: Beloved Wife in the Countryside
description: Happily married couple Minako and Tatsurou trade the busy life in Tokyo for a nice, long vacation in the countryside. Visiting her husband’s hometown for the first time in her life, Minako soon finds herself charmed by nature’s beauty and the villager’s hospitality.

name: Ghost For Hire
description: Welcome to Ghost for Hire! As the newest hire for the Ghost Protection Management, your job is to drive off mortal trespassers from various protected properties. Use our state-of-the-art equipment to survey the environment, spook the intruders, and scare them into believing in the supernatural!

name: Mirage: A Biplane Adventure
description: Embark on a daring journey in Mirage. Master aerial combat, navigate treacherous skies, and unravel the mystery behind invading machines. Can you save the world?

name: Baseball Legacy Manager 24
description: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional baseball team!

name: Commute
description: On your daily "commute" from work, you may sometimes encounter some situations. Please observe your surroundings carefully and get home safely!

name: The Simulation
description: Welcome to the Simulation! A first person, physics simulation based puzzle game where you solve puzzles and answer riddles which will test your creativity and intelligence. Gain unique powers along the way. Each puzzle is different and there are multiple ways to solve them. Good Luck!

name: FoolHut Pack: 3 games in 1
description: Play three* tiny BolHut games developed for April Fools! *There might be a fourth game inside.

name: Days With Ollie
description: The day has finally come. The day that will determine on whether or not you'll be accepted as a reporter in hololive. And not just any reporter, but the exclusive reporter for Kureiji Ollie! What goes down on in the life of the zombie idol? Find out what it'll be like to spend Days with Ollie!

name: Joe 'n Jo
description: Joe ‘n Jo is a challenging physics-based platformer about two giraffes who are strapped together for eternity. Play solo or with a friend and make your way through unique environments that will test your coordination and patience!

name: Sister's Curriculum
description: The Story of Tutoring Top 1% Repeat Students Sisters

name: Puzzle: Lines and Knots 2
description: Logical puzzle game for meditation and relaxation. The goal of the game is to assemble a puzzle consisting of knots.

name: Puzzle: Lines and Knots 2 - Free Levels Pack
description: The DLC contains +44 free game levels.

name: Digital Diamond Baseball
description: Digital Diamond Baseball is a statistically accurate baseball simulator and tabletop board game companion.

name: Bhop up!
description: A bug that became a game mechanic.You will find yourself in an incomprehensible, abstract world, among flying islands and various biomes, in the setting of the Middle Ages.

name: Hex.Plan.X
description: Retro-style sci-fi top-down post-apocalyptic shooter and strategy game.

name: Hidden Facade
description: Throughout the game, you can play as all 2 main characters, and they all have a story to tell, but don’t let your eyes and ears deceive you. 2 stories bleed together, and it’s up to you to make sense of this tragic tale before the game ends. Who you believe is up to you, but everybody’s got a secret.

name: X Mutation
description: Survive against thousands of monsters with the ability to mutate your body into various weapons! X-Mutation is a classical 3d top-down rogue-lite action game. Choose from hundreds of exciting mutations and upgrade them in different ways to create your unique build!

name: Anime Girl Puzzles
description: The anime girls are waiting to solve puzzles with you! Enjoy a plentiful selection of anime jigsaw puzzles, with a wide variety of gameplay modes.

name: Rockin' Racket
description: Rockin’ Racket is a narrative driven, fast paced, pop punk band management game with an undercurrent of teenage angst as you try to hold together a band of rowdy younger siblings, keep the crowd happy, and manage your frugal earnings while booking larger venues to rocket your band to stardom!

name: The Shell Part II: Purgatorio
description: Detective Reiji Tokisaka is back to face down a mystery that spans decades if not centuries. With the aftermath of his last case weighing on his soul and a long-silent cult resurgent, can he solve the crime—or will it become his curse?

name: I Commissioned Some Mice 3
description: I paid more artists to hide mice and cheese in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Fairy Biography 5: Demon
description: Fairy Biography 5: Demon is an interesting cannon shooting game. Players need to use mouse clicks to control gunpowder props, which can be fired continuously to clear all the treasure boxes in front of them! After completing the level, you can unlock the 1v1 confrontation with the demon spirits~

name: Cats in Boxes
description: Dive into 'Cats in Boxes' for an atmospheric adventure with captivating puzzles, cozy vibes, and cats—LOTS OF CATS. Meet unique felines, each with an interesting story, and the handcrafted levels. Find the best spot on your chair, couch, or bed, just like the cats, and enjoy!

name: 18Hell: Lost
description: "18 Hell:Lost" is a psychological horror indie game set in 1930s Shanghai. Players awaken in a grand hotel, trapped as fate and soul intertwine, leading them deeper into the unknown.

name: MILF's Plaza
description: MILF's Plaza is an erotic visual novel with a non-linear plot in a unique 2D style! The main character, full of ambition and eager for thrills, is ready to do anything to find his place in the sun. But his life is only turning out to be more complicated...

name: Battle Record: Graizor
description: As a war threatens to engulf the world, a small rebel army with there new mobile weapon, Graizor, may be the world's last hope for peace. Destroy enemy mechs with the combination of a sword and energy rifle on your journey to bring an end to a devastating war.

name: Outminer
description: Disaster strikes as you're about to complete your most important mission as a captain, forcing your crew and you to adapt to the harsh environment of a forsaken planet. Do you have what it takes to make it out alive?

name: Internet Cafe Evolution
description: This is a business simulation + construction game. It tells the evolution history of Internet cafes that began in the 1990s, and also carries the youth of nearly two generations over the past thirty years.

name: Catch Them Sweetie
description: Welcome to the card fishing simulator! Time to clear the pond of monsters. Pick a target, build the Deck, and try your Luck! Oh, and don't touch the duck, okay?

name: Hilda and the Tower of Lust
description: The mightiest female warrior, Hilda, will face a tower teeming with monsters... Can she defeat the demon king without letting down the hero?

name: I Got Trapped in the Succubus's Dream!
description: The protagonist, trapped in the succubus's dream, cannot wake up. The only way to escape is to navigate through the traps set within the dream and find the exit. If you fall into a trap, you must start over to escape. Escape from the dream and make your getaway.

name: Crossing the Sands
description:
A first-person dungeon crawler RPG with turn-based combat and grid-based movement.

Assemble a party of adventurers and explore a medieval desert world, fighting monsters in turn-based combat to build the skills and gather the equipment you'll need in order to vanquish the leader of the raiders. Master powerful healing and offensive magic to aid you on your adventures, and delve deep into ancient ruins to find out who's really pulling the strings.

name: Repair This!
description: A cell phone repair shop simulator with a first-person view, with the ability to spy on customers through gaining access to phones.

name: Making Lovers: HD Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Comet Clash
description: Take control of humanity’s last resort in defending the planet from the many dangers outer space has to offer. Shoot or deflect incoming projectiles, harvest them from the moon and spend the loot on upgrades.

name: Strayed
description: Strayed is an open-world multiplayer VR survival game focused on player vs player interaction. Explore randomly generated islands, abandoned structures, and the vast wilderness to gather resources for survival. But be aware; There are dozens of other online players with the same goal.

name: Once a Tale
description: You are invited to step into the enchanting world of fairy tales like never before. Play as Hansel and Gretel in this unique stop-motion-style single-player 3rd-person narrative adventure where you'll uncover mysteries, solve puzzles, and meet a reimagined cast of beloved fairytale characters.

name: Altered Algorithm
description: Altered Algorithm is an action-thriller VR experience blending the craft of film and games in a new way. In this story-driven game set in a futuristic 1983 LA, your playground will be detective work, head-to-head combat, and the ability to DYNAMICALLY interact with full motion video characters.

name: Ready, Steady, Ship!
description: Grab a buddy for this chaotic couch co-op puzzler. Use various tools and equipment to assemble the most efficient conveyor belts to keep the goods flowing. Supports single-player but is best played in 2-player couch coop.

name: Ants Took My Eyeball
description: Ants Took My Eyeball is a 2D action platformer roguelite. Descend in to an ever changing ant hill, fight your way through hordes of insects with a variety of weapons, face formidable bosses and ultimately find your stolen eyeball.

name: Fuchian Chronicles
description: Fuchian Chronicles is a sci-fi JRPG telling the story of Kimi, a young cadet in the Galactic Fuchian Empire's navy, as first contact is made with another advanced space faring civilization. With war looming on the horizon, an uncertain future awaits for both Kimi, and the Empire.

name: Island and Factories
description: Set management, strategy, planning, breeding elements as one. Randomly generated islands have different resources, industrialization or agriculture is up to you. Planting crops, breeding animals, mining minerals to obtain low-grade products, factory processing to obtain high-grade products.

name: ColorBlend FX: Desaturation
description: Descend into Splatland - the world of ColorBlend FX: Desaturation — a captivating mythical puzzle-platformer metroidvania that weaves a tale of glow, courage, and creativity. Join the Splatians, as they unite to restore the stolen essence back to their world, challenging the nefarious schemes of the dark entity, Lord Ashen. Splat'n'stomp juicy enemies, swim in paint pools, solve physics and color puzzles, and of course survive the death while figuring out the evil plans of the Lord.

name: Koe
description: Koe is a JRPG with the Japanese language at the core of gameplay. Koe (声) combines traditional RPG gameplay with communicative language learning techniques to bring you a truly unique and rewarding gaming, language and story experience.

name: Sker Ritual: Draigs Terror
description:
Bring the Fire! Draigs Terror is a brand new DLC cosmetic pack for Sker Ritual!

This pack includes 4 new items:
Draigs Terror: An Exclusive Premium Mask of the legendary Draig
Burning Village: An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Burning Village
Dragon's Rage: An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line to strike terror into your enemies
Draig Emblem: An Exclusive Draig Emblem Player Icon to show everyone who's bringing the heat

name: Doukyuusei Remake CSver
description: Sin descripción

name: Isonzo: Ultimate Edition
description: The Isonzo Ultimate Edition includes every visual customization option the game has to offer: 100s of items from 10 DLCs!

name: Sker Ritual: Deluxe Edition
description:
An intense, round-based, zombie horror shooter by Wales Interactive. Play solo or up-to 4-players online, facing relentless waves of Quiet Ones whilst solving mysterious missions, uncovering Easter Eggs, upgrading steampunk weapons and obtaining Miracles — a vast network of Celtic God powers.

• Old-school round-based FPS action
• Play solo or up-to 4-players online
• Story continued from Maid of Sker ‘evil' ending
• Optional objectives & hidden Easter Eggs
• Supercharged ‘Elites' with unique abilities
• Collect and enhance 'Miracle' powers
• Explore free reward systems ‘Dread Levels' and ‘Sker Pass'

name: Skull and Bones: Deluxe Edition
description:
Enter the perilous world of Skull and Bones, a co-op pirate open world action-RPG experience, to become the most infamous pirate kingpin!

Deluxe Edition includes two additional missions plus digital art book and soundtrack.

name: Starward
description: "Starward" is a 3D competitive game that combines mecha girls with classic GVG fighting gameplay, with 1V1 and 2V2 battles as the core. In "Starward", players can control mecha girls with distinct personalities and different fighting styles, and experience a three-dimensional combat experience that goes beyond the ground through fighting shooting, agile operation, and tactical formulation.

developers.name: Wuhan Shengtian Game Network Technology Co., Ltd.

name: Escape Academy: Tournament of Puzzles
description:
Hit the road with Coach Yoach and experience all new arenas, game modes, power-ups, and PUZZLES! Solve your way through giant, replayable arenas filled with secret passages, alternate routes and randomized puzzles.

Journey to Egypt’s Tomb of the First Escapist, the rain soaked and tech-infused Hackannery, or everyone’s favorite Escape theater The Showman’s Studio!

Face off against fellow Escapists in three new competitive modes Escape Race, Tic-Tac-Toe, and Scavenger Hunt, featuring all different mechanics!

And if you thought things couldn’t get wackier, Tournament of Puzzles features exciting new Power-Ups! Deploy distracting traps against your opponents or or gain an advantage by utilizing assists and secure the win.

More of a solo solver? Not a problem! Coach Yoach is happy to let any Escapist puzzle their way through the arenas in single player mode. See how fast you can conquer each course and compete for your best time!

name: A Tale of Paper: Unfolded Melody
description:
In A Tale Of Paper: Unfolded Melody you will discover the beautiful and sad tale of Ada, a brand-new origami character with its own story to tell. Learn new abilities and explore unseen locations while you try to uncover the mysteries behind this magical tale.

The last chapter of A Tale of Paper awaits. Unfold its secrets and become the ultimate origami master.

name: Super 10 VR Bundle
description: Prepare to be entertained! The developers behind 10 of the most popular and highest-rated VR titles have joined together to offer this convenient and cost-effective one-stop shop. The Super 10 VR Bundle will immerse you in a variety of exciting VR worlds that all have one crucial thing in common: they’re super fun to play.

name: Light of the Stars
description:
'Our World’ came to life with the Star Force, but the endless wars dragged it down into the darkness and chaos.
God decided to reset and recreate the world as he couldn’t tolerate it anymore.
Meanwhile, a great war on the land ended. After the war, the Elf Queen sought to acquire God’s Force.
In the process, she unsealed the ‘Early Water.’ It turned into a disaster. The world was flooded with chaos in no time.

name: A.V.A Global: Masters Pack
description: Receive 1 Unique Soldier Box Unlock 3 character skins: Marek Camo, Sailor Lili, Requiem Priest Get a pack of 300 Mod Tickets Obtain 2,500 Medals

name: The Crew Motorfest: Year 1 Pass
description: Upgrade your garage with the Year 1 Pass and obtain 25 vehicles throughout Year 1!

name: The Zombie Wave: DLC
description: Zombie Wave is a 3D shooting survival Roguelike game.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KIAH Airport
description: George Bush Intercontinental Houston Airport (ICAO: KIAH, IATA: IAH) is an international airport that serves the greater Houston area and ranks as 'Best U.S. Airport'. It will be easily one of the best add-on also In Tower! Simulator 3.

name: Synth Riders: Starship - "We Built This City"
description: Add Starship - "We Built this City" to your library!We just want to dance here, but someone stole the stage! A protest song against the closure of live music venues in Los Angeles, Starship celebrates music as the city's true cultural foundation.

name: Synth Riders: Phil Collins - "Sussudio"
description: Add Phil Collins - "Sussudio" to your library!Take a nonsense word, a horn section and the heavy funk influence of “1999” by Prince, this mid-80s Phil Collins song about a schoolboy crush will leave you wanting to just say the word “Sussudio”!

name: Synth Riders: INXS - "New Sensation"
description: Add INXS - "New Sensation" to your library!Representing late 80s rock is Australia's INXS, featuring huge drums, trademark relentless guitars and a sax solo all alongside the distinctive vocals of charismatic front man Michael Hutchence

name: Synth Riders: Devo - "Whip It"
description: Add Devo - "Whip It" to your library!Put on your “energy dome” and venture into a beautiful world of de-evolution with Devo! These pioneers of US New Wave, have a satirical, nonsensical answer to all life's problems: just crack that whip!

name: Synth Riders: A-ha - "Take On Me"
description: Add a-ha - "Take on Me" to your library!An evergreen New Wave hit, “Take On Me” packs the dance floor with infectious energy. Catchy riffs from swirling synths, topped by the stunning voice of Morten Harket as he hits that famous high note.

name: Golf With Your Friends: Critical Hit Pack
description: Grab your party and get ready for new adventures on the greens with the Critical Hit Pack.

name: WorldNeverland: White Modern Wedding Outfit Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Emeraldia
description: "EMERALDIA" is a puzzle action game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1993. The falling cubes can be crashed by dropping them twice with the same color and bumping them together. The game has three modes: adventure mode to enjoy the story, normal mode to enjoy the puzzles, and head-to head play mode.

name: Knight's Redemption: War for Freedom
description: Unite, Fight, Liberate: Write Your Legend in the Battle for Freedom!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Fast & Furious Expansion Pack
description: Step into Dom's Garage, where you can transform your cars into true four-wheeled powerhouses, and experience the thrills of Fast & Furious with the most adrenaline-pumping set of cars inspired by the films!

name: Train Sim World 4: Semmeringbahn - Wiener Neustadt - Mürzzuschlag Route
description: Explore the World's first true mountain railway in Train Sim World 4! Work winding trains at altitude through the rocky, forested peaks of the Austrian Alps. Climb the Semmering Pass before hastening downgrade towards historic Wiener Neustadt.

name: Workplace Fantasy: New Girl Chapter
description: New character expansion package for workplace fantasy, adding two new girls, complete story flow, and more CG animations. (Need to have a workplace fantasy basic version to play)

name: Tower Walker: The Northlanders
description: Tower Walker: The Northlanders adds 6 new playable species from the frozen northland territories with special and unique racial traits.

name: Eggconsole Hydlide II PC-8801
description: Hydlide Series Part 2. Become the chosen one and seal the evil consciousness targeting Fairyland! Utilize magic to conquer a field map six times larger than the previous

name: Odd Hue Out!
description: Sin descripción

name: Sunsoft is Back! Retro Game Selection
description: Sunsoft revival commemoration! Three carefully selected games from SUNSOFT's works from the 1980s: "Wings of Madoola," "Firework Thrower Kantaro's 53 Stations of the Tokaido," and "Ripple Island" are included!

name: The Sims 4: Party Essentials Kit
description: Coordinate your décor to build the perfect party atmosphere with The Sims 4 Party Essentials Kit.
